This game is fantastic.  Me and my friends have a blast playing it.  The only thing that sucks is sometimes they add new killers who are overpowered and throw the game for a while until they figure out the correct balance.

Revised 2021:

I changed my downvote to an upvote. 4 years later, the devs have addressed many problems, namely that chases took too long so playing killer was unfun. Game is still buggy, but less buggy.

----

The game is buggier than most open world survival Early Access titles. The bugs got even worse since I recommended it six months ago.


Also, the killer hosts, which means lots of lag for everybody. Moreover, fewer and fewer people are playing each day so you have to play with opponents farther and farther away, which makes the lag even worse.

-----------------

Few to many bugs for it to be a full "release" but after almost 80 hours I still have a blast killing people. More content too come will only make it better.

Personally, I love this game. It's one of my favourite games. (Yes I'm Canadian). 

Dead by Daylight is a horror game. It's a multiplayer versus game. How it works is that there is 4 survivors trying to escape from a killer. The killers objective is to sacrafice all 4 survivors. The survivors objective is to work together to escape the place you are stuck in. The objective is that you have to repair and fix 5 generators. Those generators will power the main gates which you will then half to open to actually escape. While you are doing this there is a killer that witnesses every mistake you do. Don't screw up. Work together. Stay alert, Stay alive. 

I rate this game a solid 10/10 for it's huge creativity and caring updates.

This is a very fun game dont get me wrong. That is tho, When I only play with friends and dick around. I understand if this game is a type of "Cat and Mouse" game but the killer can just camp you and 9 time out of 10 your team wont even get "A" generator up. (From my experance) . I find it just overall frustrating. I wish their was more to do to put presser on the killer other then  fucking up his hooks/traps and well.. Generators. Oh wait and that flashlight! That. No. One. Uses.

All togeather, Its a really fun game, I feel like its not even a "Cat and Mouse" game, Me and my "friends" [So lonly] play this game for like 20min before we get fed up with the repeated playstyle and pissing our pants before getting hooked and camped.
The bad reviews are from faggots that can't even tie their own shoes.

No dedicated servers. Killer makes a lobby and waits for four survivors to join. As a survivor you(and everyone in your group) have to ready up then wait 5 seconds. The game then searches for an open killer lobby, which usually fails. Then it requires all survivors in the group to ready up, and wait 5 seconds again. This can go on for an average of 5-20 minutes before you find a match. Then you finally get into the lobby, and if everyone clicks ready(and doesn't disconnect), you get to sit through a long loading screen based off of the killer's connection. You finally get into the game to play, and if you are unlucky, the killer finds you first, catches you(more often than not), and puts you on a hook. If your allies are not brave enough to save you, or if the killer sits there and watches you on the hook, you die shortly after finally getting into a game. Then you earn too few a points and lose your rank, and get almost no blood points to level up your favorite survivor.
Honestly, I'm addicted. This is a brilliant game.

Eres un superviviente retrasado que lucha para recuperar los chococryspis de las garras de suaiper. Dora la exploradora te entrenara hasta alcanzar el nivel de supersayajin 4. Entonces tendras que pelear con el patriarc para recuperar la llave del cajon de armas y liberar una batalla por todo Pandora. Pero los asesinos sondaran tu ano y viajaras con trevor al mundo del travestismo extremo, escapando de los asesinos gracias a generadores fetidos fabricados con las aguas fecales de raccon city. Dando lugar a un cataquismo termo nuclear que destruira todo Namec.
Game is Shit if you want to play with friends CAN NEVER FIND A GAME !!

I'll start off by saying this game is unique.  BUT, the lack of support by the developers since launch has been appaling.  This game should still be in alpha. 
There is not point in the matchmaking because it doesn't matter, you will be ranked with someone that is a completely different level.
If you like to play with your friends, DO NOT buy this game.  You will spend anywhere from 2-20 mintues of constantly hitting the ready button just for it to say that there is no match available.
You cannot chat via voice or even via text in this game.  If you do not have a pre-established group with TS, Skype, or Vent.... you're gonna have a bad time.
This is a good idea for a game but the developers, in the likes of Day-Z, have made their money and only commit to fixing this game part-time.

[strike]Absolutely horrendous matchmaking is the only real complaint I have about this game. It works the same general way matchmaking in Dark Souls works, in that the game spends several seconds searching for a suitable match before automatically quitting and forcing you to ready up again, rather than actively searching until you connect with someone doing the same. In other words, it is a requirement that another person hits "Ready" at the exact moment you do for you to be matched together, otherwise the game will stop searching after quite literally 2 seconds.

Somewhat recommended if you want to play alone or with TWO other friends, as finding suitable matches is much simpler and faster this way, due to the fact that solo players are often teamed up instantly with each other or teams of three. 

However I can't remotely recommended this if you're only here to play with one other friend as finding a suitable match is extremely rare and tedious when you're two teamed players.

To conclude, in its current state I wouldn't recommend anyone to spend this much money on a MP-only game with such a broken matchmaking system.[/strike]

Was playing tonight with my brother as survivors, we were having a really hard time getting in to any matches. It would constantly kick us out of our party and we would have to re-form it, their is no party system in the game you have to do it all through steam. Which if you ask me seems kind of lazy by the developers, the wraith killer is stupid OP and nearly impossible to beat. There seems to be no real matchmaking, I was being matched with prestige 1 killers. Whereas I'm still prestige 20, what sense does it make to match me up with someone who has every perk available and knows the game 100x better. In short, don't bother with this game for now. Maybe once they fix their matchmaking issues it'll worth it, unless you like being slayed in evry round.

Ok, that is amazing game. And the reasons why are:
1)Super Horror environment, chimes or no chimes every nerve in your body is suddenly out on your skin, sparking and sizzling
2)There is no hope and no way to escape to you if you are scared (you will be scared every time you play, isn't ironic?)
3) This game make you feel depressed cause it's too dificult to do anything alone. So that's why people in game usually cooperate, they repair generators together, they are also together fuck with a killer, and the most important thing is sudden courage. I meant when you see the killer put on hook your teammate, you immediatelly decide to face and withstand with courage and go to save him\her, cause he\she did the same to you before. Touching moment for us both and maybe for those one who are also spectating.
